t: Thailand’s Department of International Trade Promotion and Amazon Global Selling Sign Memorandum of Understanding to Help More Thai Brands Sell in the U.S. in the Amazon store - Press Center
s: September 11, 2024 - The Memorandum of Understanding will strengthen the existing collaboration between Thailand’s Department of International Trade Promotion and Amazon Global Selling to help Thailand brand owners and sellers seize more ecommerce export opportunities by selling in the Amazon U.S. store.
